input.sentences: today is the day that norm receives his diploma .
all of the men of norm 's family are there waiting for the big moment .
his teacher introduces him and norm comes out onto the stage .
he nervously shakes his teacher 's hand and makes a brief speech .
he bolts off the stage and makes off with what he has been waiting all night for .
output.sentences: Here is my buddy Norm as he receives his diploma.
Here is Norm waiting the moment he gets to walk on stage
